title: REPORT: LAPD Captain Allegedly Helped Les Moonves Cover Up Sexual Assault Allegations

media:group.media:title: REPORT: LAPD Captain Allegedly Helped Les Moonves Cover Up Sexual Assault Allegations
media:group.media:description:
An explosive report about an LAPD Captain who allegedly helped CBS Boss Les Moonves cover up sexual assault allegations. Ana Kasparian and Cenk Uygur discuss on The Young Turks. Watch TYT LIVE on weekdays 6-8 pm ET. http://youtube.com/theyoungturks/live

Read more HERE:  https://www.latimes.com/entertainment-arts/business/story/2022-11-02/paramount-cbs-moonves-pay-million-ny-ag-settlement

"The New York attorney general‚Äôs office released a sweeping report Wednesday that detailed an elaborate cover-up at the highest levels of CBS in late 2017 and 2018 to try to contain allegations of sexual harassment by former chief Leslie Moonves.

The report comes five years after a Los Angeles Police Department captain tipped off CBS executives, telling them a woman had come to the department‚Äôs Hollywood station to report that Moonves had allegedly assaulted her in the 1980s.

‚ÄúSomebody walked in the station about a couple hours ago and made allegations against your boss regarding a sexual assault,‚Äù the police captain said in a Nov. 10, 2017, voicemail message left for a CBS executive, according to the report. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs confidential, as you know, but call me.‚Äù
